title: I need help with Film Festival wreaths
content:
Any one know a if there is typeface that has the wreaths in it? Or maybe an online resouce that has an eps? It is used for film festivals all the time. I am doing some posters and I need this element bad! Thanks in advance for any help.   
   
Rich   
   
 ![festival award wreath](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015129im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38398.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: Rich, weren't you satisfied with what I gave you before?
Here's one I used for a poster once. Sorry it's huge. ![Laurel](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015129im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38425.jpg)

If the film has won something at Cannes, you can see under: Practical \> Graphic Chart   
   
 [http://www.festival-cannes.fr/index.php?langue=6002](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015129/http:/www.festival-cannes.fr/index.php?langue=6002)   
   
But I think this doesn't help much in your case...

It must be time warp week here at typophile:   
   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36370.html?1085164040](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208015129/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36370.html?1085164040)
